text: in the name of God Salaam to all Afghans
brave people of my country I am
informing you of the death of my son in
United States it is a very sad moment I
would like to bring to your attention
that my son Omar mateen was a very good
and educated boy he has a wife and a
child and he was very respectful of his
family I don't know what caused this
whole thing he was working for a company
that had provided him with a pistol I
never figured out that he had hatred in
his heart he went to the gay club shot
and killed about 50 men and women
I am grief-stricken and they have
announced that to the people of the
United States why he did such a thing in
the holy month of Ramadan I don't know
the issue of homosexuality and
punishment for that is up to God alone
this is not in the hands of human beings
what he has done has affected me deeply
I wanted you to know about this may God
guide all the young people towards the
pure faith of Islam
